entry.title: Saturday: Near blizzard. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Near blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this evening then clear. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
